item.description:
Please RSVP!

Market Talk - Jerry Zukowsi - Jerry Zukowski, a long-time (50 yrs) professional investor will give us his take on the markets.

IBD Research Topic by Mike Kinkead - Mike has been at it again! For those of you who have seen one of Mike's presentations and know what kind of research Mike does with respect to the CANSLIM method, you know what I'm talking about.  For those of you who haven't, don't miss this meeting!  He takes an in-depth look at key concepts and examines them empirically.

Stock Picks - Bring your tickers - the group will analyze them on the fly.

The agenda:

5:30 Boston Tiger Financial Group Meeting (see below)

7:00 Introduction, Announcements, Polls by Jeff

7:10 Market Talk / Jerry Zukowski

8:00 Break

8:10 Feature Talk - Mike Kinkead

9:30 Stock Picks

BOSTON TIGER PRE-MEETING Announcement:[/b] The Boston Tiger Meeting of the Tiger Financial Network meets during the hour from 5:30 PM to 6:50 PM. Go to http://www.tfnn.com/bostonmeeting.php to see the full announcement. For questions, see Bob Podd at bpodd@softwareresults.com. The meeting is the same room as the 7:00 meeting. To join our online discussion go to [b] http://groups.google.com/group/bostonibd[/b] or send email to Jeff Orrik at orrik@comcast.net In order to identify people who evidence expertise in particular interests we have virtual trading. To join in our virtual trading, go to this link for instructions and signup links: [b]http://groups.google.com/group/bostonibd/browse_thread/thread/ff5e030eb15a6c7c[/b] If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you! Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room. We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone. This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Boston Investor's Group April Meetup
